casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Dean Michael VARNER 115PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 23, 2017 John F. Carella, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Varner, Dean Michael. Caroline Farmer, Deputy Director, Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, Vernon K. Stewart, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 23rd of October 2017 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 23rd of October 2017."
